related_questions.question:
Que Sera Sera    By Doris Day
When I was just a little girl
I asked my mother
What will I be
Will I be pretty?
Will I be rich?
Here's what she said to me
Que sera, sera
Whatever will be, will be
The future's not ours to see
Que sera, sera
What will be, will be
Source : duniashinichi.blogspot.co.id
Questions:
1. What is the meaning of “The future's not ours to see"?
Answer:
HOTS
2.
What does the writer ask to her mother?
HOTS
Answer:
HOTS
3. What does mother say to her?
Answer:
(HOTS
4. What is the meaning of “Que Sera Sera"?
Answer:
HOTS
5. What does the lyric explain about?
Answer:
ngs you want to see to happen.​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. artinya, masa depan bukan milik kita untuk dilihat. maksutnya kita tidak tahu masa depan.

2. the writer ask what will she be in the future

3. her mother says, "whatever will be, the future's not our to see. what will be, will be"

4. apa yang akan terjadi, akan terjadi. in English, what will be, will be.

QUE SERA SERA    When I was just a little girl
I asked my mother, what will I be
Will I be pretty
Will I be rich

Here's what she said to me
Que será, será
Whatever will be, will be
The future's not ours to see
Que será, será

soal

When did the writer ask to her mother about the future?

What does the sentence “ the future’s not our to see “ mean ?

Translate the words into Indonesian, Whatever will be , will be .

How’s your parents respond and suggestion for you to get your future ?

plis bantuin ༎ຶ‿༎ຶ
​

1. when she was a little girl

2. The future belongs to God, we can't see our future

3. apa yang terjadi terjadilah

4. (apakah kamu sudah bilang pd ortu mu ingin jd apa km di masa depan?)

- yes I have, I want to be a teacher or a business girl, which is important useful for many people

5. they support me, and always remind me to dream but be realistic, and failure is natural

Read the following text to answer questions number 15 to 17. Last month, I sent to Surabaya with my friends for vacation. We went there on a night bus. When we arrived in Lamongan, the bus stopped at a small restaurant for a rest. I got off the bus to get a cup of ginger tea, and my friend drank some cold lemonade. Then I went to the toilet. It tool only a few minutes. When I came out again, the bus was not there, it had gone! My friends were not there too. Feeling shocked and confused. I asked a waiter About the bus. She said the bus departed about five minutes ago. I tried to call my friend on my phone, but the battery as running low. I could not do anything but hope and pray. After several minutes, my wish came true. The bus came back! I got on the bus and walked to my seat. I was so ashamed when everybody on the bus looked at me. I could feel my face turn red. 15. What is the best title of the text above? *     A. My vacation.
B. Vacation with my family.
C. Vacation to Surabaya.
D. Vacation to foreign Country.
Last month I went to Surabaya with my friends for vacation..." This part belongs to . . . . *
A. Orientation
B. Series of events
C. Reorientation
D. Setting of time and place
The bus was not there it had gone!" The word "it" in the second paragraph refers to . . . *
A. The writer
B. The bus
C. The waiter
The cold lemonade
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. A. my vacation

2. D. Setting of time and place

3. B. The bus

Penjelasan:

semoga membantu :)
